special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into the Singing City enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 2
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Into the Singing City deals 1 damage to each opponent.
 Stage 3
